name: Julie Sachs
summary: A results-driven benefits professional successful at managing stakeholders, multidisciplinary teams, and high-stake projects. Experienced in data and trend analysis; developing, designing, implementing and administering benefit programs; and M&A due diligence.

projects.title: Aon Pulse Survey - Roth Catch-Up Contributions for High Earners
projects.summary: In the summer of 2025, clients started reaching out concerned about what they were hearing or, in many cases not hearing, from their providers about implementing SECURE 2.0's Roth requirement for high earners. As a result of industry concern, I proposed facilitating a survey so that employers could see how others were tackling the challenging implementation.
highlights: Analyzed survey responses weekly in PowerBI.

images.caption: Aon Roth Catch-up for High Earners

projects.title: Pay Equity Analysis
projects.summary: A quick analysis of gender disparities in base pay based on open source Kaggle data.
highlights: Utilized Python to analyze dataset and create regression line
Determined and visualized residuals to identify outliers by gender and job title

images.caption: Regression line versus pay for sample job titles

degrees: Bachelors of Science with Highest Distinction in Mathematics

thought.name: IRS Releases Proposed Regulations for SECURE 2.0's Catch-up as Roth Requirement
